reviewText: My family got hooked on the Doodlebops first with my son back in 2005.  Now my daughter is in love with them.  The DVD's are so fun and entertaining to watch.  WARNING: All of the songs will get stuck in your head :)
My 30 month old LOVES the Doodlebobs and there are multiple episodes on this DVD, and not all are holiday so we can watch it year round.
Got this for my grand daughter. She absolutely loves the Doodlebops. We have had a great time dancing and watcing....
My granddaughter is 2 and is Doodlebop crazy. She plays the DVD over and over. Its colorful, happy,and delightful. The characters sing and dance and teach old fashion values. I love it.
Very happy with this video and I'm very impressed with how quick we got the video. Thankyou Amazon.
I got this DVD for my daughter for Christmas. She really enjoys it along with all the other Doodlebop DVD's.
The movie was well packaged but skips alot
Grandson watch this tape all day
My kids love this DVD i don't know why but they dance and jump around to the music. Very entertaining for them.
this was a fun video to watch - then again the doodlebops are just fun anyway...whole family enjoyed this dvd
I have a feeling since this is the only Doodlebops DVD that we currently own until we order another we will be watching this Holiday one over and over! Both of our little ones enjoy the Doodlebops!

This is the second time I have purchased this DVD. The first one stops and does NOT finish, not long into it. I thought maybe it was scratched or there was something wrong with it. I purchased the second one and the same thing happened. NOT happy at all. This is the only one I've had trouble with. Mind you, I've only bought three different ones.
Will not make this a third mistake. My kids and I are very disappointed.
thanks, came in timely manner in good condition, my daughter loves this dvd an plays it alot an sings an dances along with them
